sec.title: Dust suppression
sec.p: Rigs should have means to reduce dust at source such as:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: use of water as flushing medium;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: adding an additive to the flushing air such as water or foam;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: use of any dust suppression/extraction method, for example cyclone, filtration device.

sec.p: The dust control device should be in operation when drilling is started.
